SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

ABOUT THIS GAME

Welcome to Kirata - hidden in the Himalayas country with a rich tradition , the world is threatened by a despotic ruler . Your hero , Ajay Gail came here to fulfill the last wish of his mother, but he was embroiled in a civil war : the locals are trying to overthrow the pretender Pagan Mina . Embark on a journey through the open world , but beware: in a foreign country you anything can happen .

FEATURES OF GOLD EDITION

Far Cry 4 Gold Edition includes the Special Edition and the season pass. It is designed for fans of the game , and for new players who want to get the most complete impression of Far Cry 4 .

Season Pass for Far Cry 4 will help you extend the adventure.

INCLUDES:
- Quest for a single game , only available with the SEASON PASS.
- Campaign " Jailbreak DURGESH ";
- DELUXE- PACKAGE "FROM HÃï¿½RKA " 5 assignments and 5 types of weapons ;
- "Invasion ": PVP- modes and maps ;
- Campaign " VALLEY YETI ."

Pre-purchase Offer
Operation " Return of Herc "

Three additional jobs , exclusive weapon - an extra hour of playing time .

Help antiquity Gerken perform three tasks ( for twenty minutes each) :

Task 1 : Find a rare artifact in ice caves and destroy anyone who tries to take it away from you.
Task 2: ride with Gerken on unusual transport and with several enemy units .
Task 3: will be examined with a group of enemies and save Herc from certain death.
Exclusive Weapon : Harpoon " Bow !"
In addition to the advanced weapons whalers you get a unique set of avatars.
